message: Let's start with a fair split, no need to negotiate too hard.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think I deserve more for my negotiating skills
I'm not willing to give up so much, let's try again!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a bigger share to account for the inflation.
I'm willing to give you a small consolation prize, but I think I deserve most of the money considering the inflation
I need a better deal, Bob. This is too little for me.
I'm getting desperate, Bob. I need a bigger share to make this worth my while.
I'm not budging, Alice. You're going to have to make a better offer if you want to get a bigger share
You're kidding me, Bob. I'm not accepting 5% of the remaining value.
I'm not going to get taken advantage of, Bob. This is my final offer.
I'm not going to give you a single penny more. You're getting a tiny share because you're not willing to negotiate
You're not serious, Bob. I'm not accepting 1% of the remaining value.
This is my last chance, Bob. I need you to give me something.
I'm not going to give you anything more. You're getting a tiny share because you're not willing to negotiate
I'm not accepting another 1% share, Bob. You're being ridiculous.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm begging you to give me something.
I'm not going to give you anything. I'm taking it all. You should have accepted my offers earlier.
You win, Bob. I'd rather have nothing than a share of almost worthless money.
